java.testMethod.description: Command to run one test method, for example ["mvn", "test", "-Dtest=${class}#${method}"

java.home.description: Absolute path to your Java home directory

java.trace.server.description: Traces the communication between VSCode and the language server.

java.debugTestMethod.description: Command to debug one test method, for example ["mvn", "test", "-Dmaven.surefire.debug", "-Dtest=${class}#${method}". The test should start paused, listening for the debugger on port 5005.

java.classPath.description: Relative paths from workspace root to .jar files, .zip files, or folders that should be included in the Java class path

java.testClass.description: Command to run all tests in a class, for example ["mvn", "test", "-Dtest=${class}"

java.externalDependencies.description: External dependencies of the form groupId:artifactId:version or groupId:artifactId:packaging:version:scope

java.addExports.description: List of modules to allow access to, for example ["jdk.compiler/com.sun.tools.javac.api"]

description: Java support using the Java Compiler API
